foreignData.name: Trotziges Ausharren
foreignData.text:
Sprich das Trotzige Ausharren nur, nachdem Du angegriffen wurdest, und bevor Du die Blocker deklarierst.
Eine Kreatur Deiner Wahl erhält +1/+3 bis zum Ende des Zuges. Enttappe diese Kreatur, wenn sie getappt ist.

mainBoard.name: Defiant Stand
mainBoard.originalText:
Play Defiant Stand only after you're attacked, before you declare interceptors.
Any one creature gets +1/+3 until the end of the turn. If that creature is tapped, untap it.
mainBoard.text:
Cast this spell only during the declare attackers step and only if you've been attacked this step.
Target creature gets +1/+3 until end of turn. Untap that creature.

mainBoard.flavorText: The heart's courage is the soul's guardian.
mainBoard.name: Devoted Hero

mainBoard.flavorText: Asked how it survived a run-in with a bog imp, the pegasus just shook its mane and burped.
mainBoard.name: Armored Pegasus

mainBoard.flavorText: Unicorns don't care if you believe in them any more than you care if they believe in you.
mainBoard.name: Regal Unicorn

mainBoard.flavorText:
"For he on honey-dew hath fed,
And drunk the milk of Paradise."
—Samuel Taylor Coleridge, "Kubla Khan"
mainBoard.name: Sacred Nectar

mainBoard.flavorText: When the cat flies and the bird stalks, guard your horses carefully.
mainBoard.name: Spotted Griffin

mainBoard.flavorText: His presence brings not only a strong arm but also renewed hope.

foreignData.name: Ehrwürdiger Mönch
foreignData.text: Wenn der Ehrwürdige Mönch aus Deiner Hand ins Spiel kommt, erhältst Du 2 Lebenspunkte dazu.

mainBoard.name: Venerable Monk
mainBoard.originalText: When Venerable Monk comes into play from your hand, you gain 2 life.
mainBoard.text: When Venerable Monk enters, you gain 2 life.

mainBoard.flavorText: It is not the absence of fear that makes a warrior, but its domination.

foreignData.name: Attacke der Krieger
foreignData.text: Alle Deine Kreaturen erhalten +1/+1 bis zum Ende des Zuges.

mainBoard.name: Warrior's Charge
mainBoard.originalText: All your creatures get +1/+1 until the end of the turn.
mainBoard.text: Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

mainBoard.flavorText: Something soft bumped against the rowboat, then was gone.

foreignData.name: Anakonda
foreignData.text:
Sumpftarnung
(Wenn der verteidigende Spieler mindestens einen Sumpf im Spiel hat, kann die Anakonda nicht geblockt werden.)

mainBoard.name: Anaconda
mainBoard.originalText: Swampwalk (If defending player has any swamps in play, Anaconda can't be intercepted.)
mainBoard.text: Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)

mainBoard.flavorText: They were formidable even before they learned the use of weapons.
mainBoard.name: Gorilla Warrior

mainBoard.flavorText: Don't worry about provoking grizzly bears; they come that way.
mainBoard.name: Grizzly Bears

foreignData.name: Ungezähmte Wildnis
foreignData.text: Durchsuche Deine Bibliothek nach einer Ebene, einer Insel, einem Sumpf, einem Gebirge oder einem Wald und bringe diese Karte direkt ins Spiel. Mische Deine Bibliothek danach.

mainBoard.name: Untamed Wilds
mainBoard.originalText: Search your deck for a plains, island, swamp, mountain, or forest and put that card into play. Shuffle your deck afterwards.

rulings.text: Because the “search” requires you to find a card with certain characteristics, you don’t have to find the card if you don’t want to.

mainBoard.text: Search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

foreignData.name: Heiße Glut
foreignData.text: Die Heiße Glut fügt einem Spieler oder einer Kreatur Deiner Wahl X Schadenspunkte zu.

mainBoard.name: Blaze
mainBoard.originalText: Blaze deals X damage to any one creature or player.
mainBoard.text: Blaze deals X damage to any target.

foreignData.name: Feuerbold
foreignData.text:
Wenn der Feuerbold aus Deiner Hand ins Spiel kommt, fügt er einer Kreatur Deiner Wahl 2 Schadenspunkte zu.
(Wenn Du der einzige Spieler mit Kreaturen bist, fügt der Feuerbold einer Deiner Kreaturen 2 Schadenspunkte zu.)

mainBoard.name: Fire Imp
mainBoard.originalText: When Fire Imp comes into play from your hand, it deals 2 damage to any one creature. (If you're the only player with creatures, Fire Imp deals 2 damage to one of your creatures.)
mainBoard.text: When Fire Imp enters, it deals 2 damage to target creature.

mainBoard.flavorText: Hill giants are mostly just big. Of course, that does count for a lot!
mainBoard.name: Hill Giant

mainBoard.flavorText: The bigger they are, the harder they avoid work.

foreignData.name: Grobschlächtiger Goblin
foreignData.text: Der Grobschlächtige Goblin kann nicht blocken.

mainBoard.name: Hulking Goblin

mainBoard.flavorText: Swing your axe as a broom, to sweep away the foe.

foreignData.name: Lavaaxt
foreignData.text: Die Lavaaxt fügt Deinem Gegner 5 Schadenspunkte zu.

mainBoard.name: Lava Axe
mainBoard.originalText: Lava Axe deals 5 damage to your opponent.
mainBoard.text: Lava Axe deals 5 damage to target player or planeswalker.

mainBoard.flavorText: Don't let its appearance frighten you. Let its claws and teeth do that.
mainBoard.name: Lizard Warrior

mainBoard.flavorText: Charging alone takes uncommon daring or uncommon stupidity. Or both.

foreignData.name: Wütender Goblin
foreignData.text: Für den Wütenden Goblin gilt die Einsatzverzögerung nicht.

mainBoard.name: Raging Goblin
mainBoard.originalText: Raging Goblin is unaffected by summoning sickness.
mainBoard.text: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)

mainBoard.flavorText: Cast the weight as though it were a die, to see a rival's fate.

foreignData.name: Vulkanhammer
foreignData.text: Der Vulkanhammer fügt einer Kreatur oder einem Spieler Deiner Wahl 3 Schadenspunkte zu.

mainBoard.name: Volcanic Hammer
mainBoard.originalText: Volcanic Hammer deals 3 damage to any one creature or player.
mainBoard.text: Volcanic Hammer deals 3 damage to any target.
